title: The Quest Music Pack
description: The Quest Music Pack contains 20 tracks composed from a single, massive virtual orchestra.
longDescription:
The Quest Music Pack contains over 30 minutes of orchestral music in 20 individual tracks that were composed, mixed and mastered as a single session for AAA level quality and cohesion.

Youtube sample video

Soundcloud sample

Orchestral tracks that are looped in production contain audio artifacts at the beginning of the track. Because of this, none of the tracks in The Quest Music Pack were looped in production. Instead, many tracks contain a long tail which means you can create loops and stingers wherever you need.
technicalDetails:
Features:

- Over 30 minutes of music composed using one massive virtual symphonic orchestra.

- 2 main themes with soft variations of each.

- Combat and chase music with long tails perfect for creating loops and fade outs.

- Softer music tracks for menus and more emotional game sequences.

- Other assorted powerful and epic tracks.

- Rendered in 44100Hz 16bit .wav files lets you finely tune audio levels and edit non-destructively.

- Composed, mixed and mastered to the level of a AAA game.

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 38 min

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
